message: Hi Bob, I'm looking to sell this product. I think it would be perfect for you! I'm asking $160 for it. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I understand your perspective, but $80 is quite a bit lower than I'm aiming for.  Could you meet me halfway at $120?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $90?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair here. $120 is already a very competitive price for this product.  I can't go any lower than $110.  What do you say?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to consider $95?
